spending_analysis.template: Based on your {category} spending, you spent ₹{amount} {timeframe}. This is {change}% compared to the previous period. {insights}

affordability_check.template: Based on your current financial position, you {can_afford} afford {item} worth ₹{amount}. Your available balance is ₹{available}, and after this purchase you'd have ₹{remaining}. {recommendation}

investment_summary.template: Your total investment portfolio is worth ₹{total_value}, with a {change}% change this month. Your investments include: {breakdown}. {recommendation}

financial_health.template: Your financial health score is {score}/100. Your net worth is ₹{net_worth}, with assets worth ₹{assets} and liabilities of ₹{liabilities}. {insights}

privacy_fallbacks.transactions: I need access to your transaction data to provide spending analysis. Please enable transaction permissions in Privacy Settings.
privacy_fallbacks.accounts: To analyze your financial position, I need access to your account information. Please enable account permissions.
privacy_fallbacks.investments: For investment analysis, I need access to your investment data. Please enable investment permissions.
privacy_fallbacks.liabilities: To check affordability or debt analysis, I need access to your debt information. Please enable liability permissions.
